ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/<%= props.name %>.xcworkspace -scheme <%= props.name %> -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 11

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/<%= props.name %>.xcworkspace -scheme <%= props.name %> -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 11
